title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 811.1 - Adopting order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 811.1 - Adopting order

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to
article 12 of the Public Health Law, the Water Resources Commission, after
proper study and following a public hearing conducted by the former Water

Pollution Control Board, held on due notice, hereby adopts and assigns the
following classifications and standards of quality and purity to all surface
waters within the Chemung River drainage basin, as hereinafter defined. Said
drainage basin includes all land surface water areas of the Chemung River
drainage basin within New York State except Newtown Creek drainage
basin. (b) This adoption and
assignment of standards of quality and purity to the above designated waters
shall be effective February 1, 1963. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
811.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
